name: Shacknews chatty alternation

/*
Shacknews.com - New site tweaks
by Nitrium mainly
*/

@-moz-document url-prefix(http://www.shacknews.com/chatty) {

	/*
	general tweaks
	- sets the default chatty font to Arial
	- reverts user color back to orange
	- changes the color of the footer to white and sets fonts to Arial
        - change the color of your own username to blue
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap body,
	#chatty_comments_wrap td,
	#chatty_comments_wrap div
	{
		font-family: Arial !important;
		font-size: 13px !important;
                font-style: inherit;
 
	}



div#chatty_comments_wrap {border-top: 1px solid #252930 !important; } 
div.a:link {color:red !important } 
.border-grd {background: transparent !important; height: 3px !important; margin: 1 !important; } 
div.article-body p { font-size: 90% !important;line-height: 16px !important;} 

        #container 
        {
                color: #ccc !important; 
                background: #0c1118 !important;
        } 



div.oneline span.oneline_user { color: #FFBA00 !important; font-weight: normal !important; } 

	#chatty_comments_wrap .user a,
	#chatty_comments_wrap .oneline_user
	{
		color: #ffba00 !important;
	}

	#chatty_comments_wrap .this_user
	{
		color: #66ccff !important;
	}

	#footer
	{
		font-family: Arial !important;
		margin-top: 0px !important;
		background-color: #000000 !important;
	}

	#content + .cb {
		display: none !important;
	}
	
	/*
	re-styles the Shacknews user comment (news post)
	*/
	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_14475"]
	{
		border-top: solid 1px # !important;
		background-color: #0C2F32 !important;
                background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(center top, #0c1118, #000060) !important;
	}

	#chatty_comments_wrap div[class~="fpauthor_14475"] .postmeta .author .user a
	{
